projects.title: Website of 24h de l'INSA
projects.description: Complete redesign and rebuild of the 24h de l'INSA website from scratch, featuring modern UI/UX design, responsive layout, and enhanced user experience for the annual student event.

projects.title: LifeSignal
projects.description: Decentralized inheritance platform for secure digital asset transfer using Oasis Sapphire confidential EVM, Walrus storage, and smart contract voting system.

projects.title: PassAMU
projects.description: Secure password manager with JavaFX interface featuring AES256 encryption, password generation, folder organization, and cross-platform clipboard support.

projects.title: CatEveryHourBot
projects.description: Mastodon bot that automatically posts cat pictures every hour using Node.js and Mastodon API. Gained 2,600+ followers with development and production environments.
